document.masterDocTitle: An update on the spider genus Loxosceles (Araneae: Sicariidae) in the Afrotropical region, with description of seven new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An update on the spider genus Loxosceles (Araneae: Sicariidae) in the Afrotropical region, with description of seven new species

bibRefCitation.author: Lawrence
bibRefCitation.refString: Lawrence, R. F. (1927) Contributions to knowledge of the arachnid fauna of South West Africa. Annals of the South African Museum, 25, 1 - 75.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Loxosceles spiniceps
—
Lawrence, 1952 : 187
, f. 7;
Newlands, 1986 : 75
, f. 49–51 (syn.).
Loxosceles spinulosa
—
Newlands, 1975 : 144
(misidentified).
